headline: Verizon Frontline Crisis Response Team supports 800+ agencies during 2024 emergency responses
summary: What you need to know: The Verizon Frontline Crisis Response Team deployed nearly 900 times in 2024, supporting first responders in nearly every state and Washington D.C.The team responded to requests for support from public safety agencies during responses to tornadoes, hurricanes, and wildfires.
